# Get Tercen
In this section you download Tercen and set it up.

To download Tercen you require to:

* Go to the Google drive folder at the following link:

(https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1NKsu1vRqC8jhDn3aF3qINi0Bq-_cMNCu?usp=sharing)

* Download the Tercen setup called `Tercen Setup 0.X.Y.exe` 

Where `X` and`Y` in the file name represents the version numbers. These are changing as we enhance the product. Download the current version in this folder. 


You have now downloaded Tercen.
